com.gwtplatform.mvp.client
Interface HasEventBus

All Superinterfaces:
HasHandlers
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public interface HasEventBus
extends HasHandlers

Marker interface that tell that an object is bound to an EventBus. Objects implementing this type can be used as a source when firing an event on the event bus. Deprecated use directly HasHandlers instead.

Author:
Christian Goudreau
